title: Bug Found in the Store
body:
Didn't know where to report it. Bug Found:

Attempt to buy Malzahar with exactly 4800 IP. 
Does not let me purchase. 
Same with all other 4800 champions. 
Already Restarted the Client. 
Beta Client. 

Not sure if this happens when you attempt to purchase any other champions with their matching prices in IP, but patching it should be fairly simple.

replies.body:
This may be a sync problem with the updated client.  Head back to the legacy version to get this fixed up:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!

Or I could just play a quick ARAM and get some extra IP since the check equation is messed up. :P
Thanks anyways. :D
